Beyond Hitting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for responding to hitting, biting, and physical aggression at every age.

cta_copy.title: The Beyond Hitting course will show you how to respond
cta_copy.body: You'll replace panic with a clear next move — through narrated audio lessons, illustrated response guides, and a community of parents handling the same aggression.

name: Childhood Anxiety
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping your child manage worry, fear, and avoidance behaviors.

cta_copy.title: The Childhood Anxiety course will help you shrink the worry cycle
cta_copy.body: Your child starts doing things fear currently blocks — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated guides for each anxiety pattern, and parents navigating the same avoidance.

name: Breaking the Cycle
